original_title: Tina Turner: Rio '88 - Live In Concert
overview: On January 16, 1998, Tina Turner performed in front of a record-breaking crowd of 180,000 fans at the Maracan√£ stadium in Rio de Janeiro, setting a Guinness World Record at the time for the "largest paying rock concert attendance for a solo artist". Accompanied by dancers, glitter and fireworks, Tina delivered 13 tracks in her own inimitable and explosive style.
title: Tina Turner: Rio '88 - Live In Concert
